Reviews.Title: “Questionalbe Neighborhood”
Reviews.Author: teobuck
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel for 3 nights in February, 2012, and the staff was very friendly, but the neighborhood and the people around the hotel were of questionalbe character. I was concerned about the safety of my car and myself. It is the biggest facility in the United States that Motel 6 has, I was told by the clerk. The bed was acceptable, but not great. The faucet in the bathroom sprayed water all over the place, and the floors were just so so as far as being clean. The doors had dents in them as if someone had tried to kick them in. The water pressure was great in the shower!! TV sound would not go except on a few chanels so could not watch TV stations I wanted to watch w/o disturbing other guests. I did not use the pools or other facalities. I would NOT recommend staying at this motel 6. There is one closer to Metro Center that looks smaller and nicer from the outside, that one might want to try, and the prices appear to be the same. I picked this hotel originaly because it was close to the place I needed to be.

Reviews.Title: “Stay away from this dump”
Reviews.Author: erezn
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a place to sleep nearby the airport. I didn't care too much about amenities or decor. But hey, the place is full of drug addicts. Used condoms in the stairway. I ran away from this place as fast as I could.

Reviews.Title: “Terrifying night”
Reviews.Author: rdltng
Reviews.Content: Worst Motel 6 I ever stayed at. Got in late and was trying to stay a bit outside downtown Phoenix to be on the safe side. I didn't know the area and wasn't even expecting much when I arrived. The room was shabby. When I went to sleep, I was awoken by a phone call from whom I thought was a Motel 6 staff member telling me the motel had an emergency and had to be evacuated, to stay calm and that police would come evacuate me. He went through all the protocols and told me the story of a madman waving a knife, threatening to rape and kill people. I was half asleep, scrambling to get my contacts in and getting ready for the police to come. He then got dramatic and said that the man just broke into a room and to bang on the walls to flush him out and to alert the police where to go. I did not. Then he said, oh my GOD, ma'm, bang on your door, NOW, as if the guy was about to bust in my room. I was petrified and envisioned my death. He then said the police arrived and he'd transfer me to another staff member who would stay w me until the police escorted me out. This staff member had no clue what I was taking about, and the guy was still on the line saying, "cha cha cha." I realized it was a scam but was absolutely terrified as a single woman that this sicko would play out his fantasy that night and come kill me, as he already called and knew my room #! I basically had post traumatic stress at this point and went to the front office where I found toothless, seemingly uneducated employees who were not phased. They informed me that he calls every night and seemed ok with this. There was an elderly man who appeared to be a drug addict, possibly the franchisee. He said the only problem I'd have is if I brought a problem with me, implying I was a prostitute or addict. They seemed uninterested in relocating me to another Motel 6 but did refund me for the night. Against my better judgment, I lay in bed with the lights, my clothes and shoes on the rest of the night. When I woke up the next morning, I realized the area was run down and heard it had high crime. I am lucky to be here to write this review and told myself I'd never travel alone again or stay at a Motel 6 after this.

Reviews.Title: “Noisy room, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: HannuVantaalta
Reviews.Content: OK, you can't really expect anything fancy for $30, but somehow I did expect little more. The room was very basic, but mainly clean. The nearby highway was very noisy and the single windows of the room were not able to keep that noise outside, thus resulting to a rather badly slept night. The staff at the reception, however, was very friendly and helpful!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly Service can't be beat!”
Reviews.Author: Junkjeans
Reviews.Content: This hotel is perhaps an older property but the friendly service and helpfulness of all the staff is the Best. No matter what I asked for they were there to help. Denise, Melissa, and Able the security guard were especially helpful! The price was certainly right for a no frills accomodation. Restaurants are not too far away on major streets. I would recommend this hotel for the personal service alone. They ALL made me feel very welcome!

Reviews.Title: “Nasty ROACHES”
Reviews.Author: beckyaz2334
Reviews.Content: Stay there 12-01-09, Nasty place , Dirty, ROACHES. Noisy. Just down right Nasty. People hanging out in the lobby. And there were no wash coth. and no Bible. Who owns these places? Even went back to VA hospital and told them they should take that motel off there list. Nasty place I ever satyed. Also it smell like URIN

Reviews.Title: “Awful”
Reviews.Author: janiceandbryn
Reviews.Content: We expected Motel 6 to be basic but we were not prepared for the awfulness of this one. The room appeared very dirty and the bed linen - if it had been changed - was full of holes and stained. I feel sorry for the Motel 6s which try - we have stayed in some- but the brand is totally trashed by experiences such as this one. We will be avoiding all Motel 6s in future.

Reviews.Title: “You won't sleep a wink.”
Reviews.Author: Lonedog
Reviews.Content: I was tired of driving around phoenix and hotels in this area are not easily found. I should have noticed how close the interstate was. The doors are thin and cinder block walls couldn't block out the roaring all night traffic noise. That combined with car alarms, honking, noisy AC, cigarette drenched bed linens (non-smoking room) made for a horrendous sleepless night. Dirty, funky in a bad way, cops driving the parking lot all night--probably cause they needed to. Drive further out of town or stay right across the street at a cheap place I didn't see until daylight. No wireless and I could not get my modem to work.

Reviews.Title: “This is the worst Motel 6 I have ever stayed at!”
Reviews.Author: Josh97056
Reviews.Content: This nasty Motel 6 is in a high crime area and is run down. The check in staff was rude and unhelpful. Drug dealers and hookers everywhere on the streets. Bedding was dirty with stains and burn holes, was woke up several times in the night by people partying in the apartment complex next door, then woke up at 5am by the garbage truck. Gave up trying to sleep and Left.
